sub_title: Manager hull- superstructure building bij Royal Van Lent Shipyard
summary:
During my working career (35 years) I worked for four different organisations and in three complete different branches. In the course of these years I gained solid experience in different functions and many key areas such as marketing and customer relationship, management, personnel management, project management, and that for the last 5 years also internationally.

I have proved to be able to adjust very quickly.  Further, I am eager to learn, tenacious but when necessary also flexible, a team player and results oriented.

school.name: Haagse Hoogeschool te Voorburg/ Den Haag

education.field_of_study: HTS Technische Bedrijfskunde / Technical College for Technical en Commercial Business Administration
MTS Werktuigbouwkunde / Technical College for Mechanical Engineering

profile_positions.description:
Situated on Kaag Island, just south of Amsterdam, Van Lent began building ships as far back as 1849. Construction rapidly expanded from wooden yachts into steel and aluminum, and today Van Lent is solely dedicated to the finest custom built superyachts. Over 300 highly skilled craftsmen, across every discipline of modern superyacht construction, are responsible for an average of two launches a year. First class facilities include two dry docks and two slipways of up to 120m in length. 

Feadship 

Feadship is widely recognised as the world leader in custom built superyachts. Based in the Netherlands with roots dating back to 1849, Feadship is defined by unparalleled craftsmanship, setting the standard in every aspect of design, engineering and construction. Each bespoke superyacht is created in partnership with an owner who invests in a uniquely rewarding build experience.

Specialties
Custom Yacht Building, Charter, Superyacht, Refit Superyacht

Function: Manager Construction Yachtbuilder

profile_positions.description:
A company building, since 1979, to customer specifications, luxury yacht interiors in prefab/template form in factory, followed by full installation at the yard for large sailing and motorboats from 30 to 60 meters in length.

Function: Projectmanager and member of Management Team

Responsible: Build and implement a plan for all domestic and international projects and this inside the factory of the company as well as outside on shipyards. 

Contacts: Clients, owners, owner representatives, architects, subcontractors, suppliers.

Activities: 
Time and resource planning of building projects
• Supervision of all operational staff, between 30 and 70 members, and relevant functions, inside  the factory as well as outside on shipyards
• Translate client wishes to a workable production plan without losing profit goals
• Maintain and control project schedules of all building projects in progress and executed
• Customerservice management of each project from tender until delivery, including after sales
• Identify and generate extra work
• Negotiate contracts with subcontractors and suppliers
• Project cost control

Since my start at de Ruiter I was Project manager for the following interior projects : MY Steel - SY Erica XII - SY Athos - MY Jamaica Bay II - MY Mirgab - SY Marie - MY Batton Rouge - SY Sarissa - SY Rainbow - MY Midlandia and SY YIII (see also www.ruiter.com)
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager

profile_positions.description:
Gemeentelijke Energie Bedrijf / Energie Bedrijf Amsterdam N.V. / 
Energie Noord-west N.V./ Energie Service Amsterdam (onderdeel Nuon N.V.)

A company with core activity in rental and sale of various heating and warm water installations to private and business clients in Amsterdam and beyond. 

Several functions fulfilled:

Function: Unitmanager Advice & Inspection and member of Management Team

Responsible : Marketing and Sales

Contacts: individual private clients, business clients, subcontractors and suppliers

Activities : 
• Supervision of salesteam, consisting of five salespeople
• Tendering for big projects for new housing projects from Housing Corporations
• Organising marketing activities for specific targetgroups, private clients and Housing Corporations
• Maintain customercontact during and after implementation of projects
• Generate monthly salesreports
• Budget control. 

Personal contribution : 
• Designed and established a new showroom in Leiden
• Designed and implemented  a website for Energie Service Amsterdam B.V.

===========================================================================

Function: Senior Employee Administration (Planning & Logistics)

Responsible : Customer service center/customer complaints

Contacts: private clients and business clients

Activities :
• Supervision of 20 mechanics.
• Maintaining and implementing customer complaint procedure and reporting

===========================================================================

Function : Planner/Werkvoorbereider

Responsible : Scheduling mechanics 

Activities :
• Scheduling  all activities of 45 mechanics
• Procurement of  materials  

Personal contribution : 
Development and implementation of a macro in Excel, with an interface to the company’s main computer systeem for automation of the overall administration of the compaany
profile_positions.title: Unit Manager Retail

profile_positions.description:
Fokker Aircraft B.V.(Schiphol-Oost)
Aircraft manufacturer of several aircraft models such as F16, F27, F28, F50 and F100.

Function: Tecnical Planner 

Activities : 
• Create production instructions by technical product drawings.
• Procurement of materials
• Determining production flows between the various departments in the company
• Calculate  the proces duration of activities of the various departments within the company
profile_positions.title: Technical planner / Technische Werkvoorbereider

profile_positions.description:
Fokker Aircraft B.V.(Schiphol-Oost)
Aircraft manufacturer of several aircraft models such as F16, F27, F28, F50 and F100.

Function : Toolmaker
